Text: Kylähullut is a Finnish hardcore punk band consisting of Alexi Laiho (Children of Bodom), Tonmi Lillman (ex-To/Die/For), and Vesku Jokinen (Klamydia).

Text: Kylähullut:  The band name means "Village Idiots" in Finnish.
